column1: Bavette's Bar & Boeuf////Really wanted to like Bavette's.  The space is beautiful
column2: and they make one of the best Old Fashioned that I've ever had.   They may be on par with Aviary for that drink
column3: although my wife's negroni was not great
column4: and we have had better at many places in the area.  The goat cheese appetizer is amazing
column5: and their in-house baked bread is delicious.
